actionsPanelCSSCode: body {padding-top: 20px;font-family: system-ui;}.TRANSPARENCY__ACTION {width: calc(100% - 40px);height: 200px;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);margin: 20px;line-height: 200px;color: white;cursor: pointer;display: flex;flex-direction: column;justify-content: center;align-items: center;transition: background-color 300ms linear;}.TRANSPARENCY__ACTION--ACTIVE {background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);}
